DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe United States America ( USA ) . The purpose study test whether insulin detemir safe least effective alternative insulin glargine control blood glucose basal/bolus therapy patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Insulin Detemir Plus Insulin Aspart Against Insulin Glargine Plus Insulin Aspart Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes least 12 month Treated oral antidiabetic drug insulin regimen without oral antidiabetic drug BMI maximum 40 kg/m2 HbA1c great equal 7.0 % less equal 11.0 % Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy Recurrent major hypoglycaemia Impaired hepatic renal function Cardiac problem uncontrolled hypertension
